replies.msg:
主要用黎做video editing，1080p片為主數量多同埋片都幾長下，3d/effects野比較少，所以rendering既效率需求最大。因為純粹當佢係搵食架生既關係，所以性價比行先，外形乜乜物物呢d花神野可免則免 ，洗少一蚊算一蚊

1 x AMD Ryzen™ Threadripper™ 3960X 24-Core/48-Thread
(好耐之前已經決定買3960X)
價錢：$11,999
1 x AORUS GeForce® GTX 1080 Ti Xtreme Edition 11G
(用返舊機張Display卡，窮唔想洗咁多錢)
價錢：$0

1 x GIGABYTE 技嘉 GA-TRX40 AORUS PRO WIFI TRX40, DDR-4, Socket sTRX4, Intel GbE Lan,WiFi ax, ATX M/B
(TRX40板$3100~$5900都有，唔識分所以直接揀最平既)
價錢：$3,150
2 x ADATA 32GB Kit 3200MHz XPG GAMMIX D10 DDR4 (2x16GB) AX4U3200316G16-DB10 連黑色散熱片
(淨係知想要64GB同3200MHz既ram，所以都係揀最平既)
價錢：$2,100
1 x Seagate 4TB SkyHawk Surveillance ST4000VX007 SATA3 6Gb/s /64MB Cache HDD
(4TB HDD揀最平既)
價錢：$609
1 x Kingston A2000 1TB PCIe Gen3x4 M.2 2280
(1TB SSD揀最平既)
價錢：$830
1 x Thermaltake Toughpower GF1 850W 80 Plus Gold TT Premium Edition Fully Modular
(唔係好清楚Watt數要幾多，直覺850W夠用，強國reviewer裝機猿建議買1000W好d，依家唔太清楚升唔升1000W好，求意見)
價錢：$850
1 x Phanteks Eclipse P400A Middle Tower Case 強化玻璃側板 Tempered Glass Black 黑色 PH-EC400ATG_DBK01
（睇Gamer Nexus推介本年度最佳機箱 https://youtu.be/2u8rGgYrRZY
Airflow睇落唔錯，所以就揀左呢個）
價錢：$750
1 x Noctua NH-D15S 140mm SSO2 D-Type Premium CPU Cooler
（睇左呢個review所以揀 NH-D15S https://youtu.be/0fq-oi7p6r4 ，性價比最高）
價錢：$590

總計: $20878

求意見
玩到TR好心就上AIO

漏左機箱上面兩把風扇
2 x Be Quiet! Pure Wings 2 140mm PWM Cooling Fan
價錢：$270

https://www.anandtech.com/show/12454/analyzing-threadripper-cooling-big-base-cooling-wins/6
"If you are upgrading from another platform/socket and are wondering whether to buy adapters for your cooler, our generic suggestion is “don't”.
